msbt.message: You'rewait, I got it, don't tell me You're ! Right? See, told you I had it.I'm . I gotta tell ya, I'm excited to do this whole island thing, !
So, did ya get your tent yet?<10_4 /> No worries if you forgot. Just head back to the plaza and get it there.

Looks like we're both havin' trouble deciding where to set up our tents. I mean, it's a pretty big decision!Of course, no matter where we settle down on this little island, at least we'll be neighbors!

You already found a good spot, huh?I was tryin' to just FEEL for the best spot, but I was havin' trouble 'cause EVERY spot feels like the best one. I couldn't just sit here thinkin' it over forever, so I grabbed a stick and threw itand here's where it landed. So now this is my spot! OK, I know there's only so far I could throw the stick, but I'm likin' this!
Looks good to me!
I'll find you a spot!
Maybe reconsider?
For real, ?!Well, if you're sure Actually, let's think about this a little.If I put my tent here
Looks nice, don't it?
Looks great!
Something seems off.
Awesome! From now on, this won't be just anywhere on the island. It's gonna be my home sweet home!
You couldn't have picked a better spot. You rock, !

Hold up. Does this mean you helped with his tent too?Whoa! You're a seriously awesome person!I gotta be honest, when we first got here I was kinda worried there were way too few of usBut if we get to live here with someone like you, I can totally rest easy! Oh! Everyone else is probably waitin' on us, so let's get back to the plaza, !
I wonder how that guy is doin'.He might be havin' as much trouble as I was. Maybe you should go see if he needs help too!
Yeah, good call. Gotta put my best foot forward and all that.I'll wander around and keep looking before I make a decision I can't take back.
Oh! Well, that's no good.This island ain't big, so I better pick a place that's solid for all my pals. I'll think on it some more.
Whoa, for real? You're gonna pick out the perfect spot FOR me?!You'd do that for someone you just met? Y'know, you're alright, .In that casehere ya go. It's your show now, !
You go pick out the perfect spot for that tent I gave you.I'm gonna go wait at the plaza in the meantime, OK?
Letting you decide where my tent goes is a huge relief, !I don't really care where I end up. I'm good knowing you did your best to pick out a spot for me.
This is sooo hard! My gut says this spot is goodbut my brain says maybe there's an even better one. Aww, I dunno, . What do you think?
This looks good.
I'll find you a spot!
Maybe reconsider?
Thanks for looking out for me, .If that guy looks lost too, maybe you could help him.
How's it going, ? You find me a sweet spot to live yet?
The sweetest!
It's a done deal!
Nice! I can't wait to see it. Thanks, !
I'm in love with that place you picked out for me. I seriously couldn't have done it better myself!
If that guy looks lost too, I bet he'd love it if you helped him out.
I hope that guy ends up somewhere good as well.
